pageContext.claim: “More than a dozen European countries -- as well as South Korea, Taiwan, and many others -- have already reopened schools, and cases have not risen. We can achieve the same goal if we unite together, follow the best medical practices, and apply common sense.”
pageContext.analysis: This is not a one to one comparison as Trump makes it seem. Many of the countries where schools reopened had lower cases counts than in several places across the U.S. and even then, schools were not reopened without hesitation.
